00101 class Grid2D_rz : public Grid2D {
00102 
00103  public:
00104  
00105         Grid2D_rz(int dimr, int dimz, double diffr, double diffz) : Grid2D(dimr,dimz,diffr,diffz) 
00106                 { beginx=0.0; for(int j=0; j<dimr; j++) x[j]=j*dx; };

00115 class Grid3D {
00116 
00117     vector<Grid2D> grid;
00118         // longitudinal boundaries of the bunch
00119         double zleft, zright;
00120         Grid2D ghostl, ghostr;
00121 
00122 public:
00123 
00124         Grid3D() {}
00125         Grid3D(int NZ, double zl, double zr, Grid2D& g);
00126         ~Grid3D() {}
00127         Grid2D& operator[](int j) { return grid[j]; } 
00128         void reset();
00129         // left and right bunch ends can be updated
00130         double& get_zleft() { return zleft; }
00131         double& get_zright() { return zright; }
00132         // This dz can be different from the dz in Grid1D. 
00133         double get_dz() { return (zright-zleft)/grid.size(); }
00134         // dx,dy taken from Grid2D
00135         double get_dx() { return grid[0].get_dx(); }
00136         double get_dy() { return grid[0].get_dy(); }
00137         int get_NX() { return grid[0].get_NX(); }
00138         int get_NY() { return grid[0].get_NY(); }
00139         int get_NZ() { return grid.size(); } 
00140         void Pic2Grid(double pic_quantity, double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y, double pic_pos_z); 
00141         double Grid2PIC(double pic_pos_x, double pic_pos_y, double pic_pos_z);
00142         // ghost cells
00143         double* get_ghostl() {return ghostl.get_grid();}
00144     double* get_ghostr() {return ghostr.get_grid();}
00145         
00146         
00147 };
